name: RetroConsole Cat
description: RetroConsole Cat is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its retro box design and soldier buttons, it brings a nostalgic feel to the world of technology. Its arms and legs resemble that of a cat, giving it a playful and agile appearance. The screen, also shaped like a cat, displays vibrant visuals and data with precision. To protect itself, RetroConsole Cat is equipped with a sturdy helmet addon, ready to face any challenge that comes its way.
